title: What can I do if my Wi-Fi connection constantly disconnects?
answer:
*   Make
  sure you are within the working range of the Wi-Fi hotspot.
*   Go
  to the Wi-Fi settings screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141114115541979001.gif) > **Advanced**, and touch **Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep**. From the
  displayed option menu, choose **Always**.
  



![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141114115659577001.gif)
 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141114115628258001.gif)
![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141114115635799001.gif) 
If the problem persists, restart Wi-Fi on your phone, and/or restart the Wi-Fi hotspot
device.
Note: The figures are for your reference only. Actual
screens may vary slightly.
